summary: Social media app similar to Instagram with user registration, reels, and video content
architectural_notes: Social media platform requiring user authentication
Short-form video (reels) and standard video support required
Content moderation system needed to enforce polite language usage

existing_features.title: Implement user registration and authentication system using Internet Identity that allows users to create and manage their accounts
Create user profile system with username, bio, and profile picture support
Build reels functionality that allows users to upload, view, and scroll through short-form vertical video content
Create video feed interface that displays uploaded videos with playback controls, creator information, and engagement options
Design and implement a cohesive visual identity with a modern, photography-focused aesthetic featuring warm earth tones, clean typography, and elegant spacing that emphasizes visual content
Update ProfileSetupModal and ProfileEditForm components to display user-friendly error messages when content validation fails
Update ReelUploadForm component to display user-friendly error messages when description content validation fails

new_feature_requests.summary: Reels functionality for short-form video content
Implement video upload system that handles video file storage and retrieval with support for multiple video formats
Implement content moderation to ensure polite language is used across the platform
Add content validation to profile bio field that checks for inappropriate language before allowing profile creation or updates
Add content validation to reel description field that checks for inappropriate language before allowing reel uploads
